    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108701</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measuring magnetic force between two magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messende magnetische Kraft zwischen zwei Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force magnétique de mesure entre deux aimants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força magnética de medição entre dois ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza magnetica di misurazione fra due magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της μαγνητικής δύναμης μεταξύ δύο μαγνητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza magnética que mide entre dos imanes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a setup for determining the force of attraction between two magnets using an elastic or a weak spring and a water container.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation für die 
Bestimmung der Kraft der Anziehung zwischen zwei Magneten mit einem 
elastischen oder schwachen Frühling und einem Wasserbehälter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour 
déterminer la force de l'attraction entre deux aimants à l'aide d'un
ressort élastique ou faible et d'un récipient de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
determinar a força de uma atração entre dois ímãs usando uma mola
elástica ou fraca e um recipiente da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per 
la determinazione della forza dell'attrazione fra due magneti per 
mezzo di una molla elastica o debole e di un contenitore dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για τον 
καθορισμό της δύναμης της έλξης μεταξύ δύο μαγνητών 
χρησιμοποιώντας ένα ελαστικό ή αδύνατο ελατήριο και ένα 
εμπορευματοκιβώτιο ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
determinar la fuerza de la atracción entre dos imanes usando un 
resorte elástico o débil y un envase del agua.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagneten</string>

          </keyword>
